item.title: HTC has unveiled the Desire 620 and 620G
item.description: HTC has introduced the HTC Desire 620 dual sim, the successor to the HTC Desire 610. Source: HTC. The 620G in Milkyway gray. Jack Yang, President of HTC South Asia, stated that the new HTC Desire model provides a balance of modern design, strong processing, and fast connectivity, making it a suitable option for budget-conscious entertainment enthusiasts. The Desire 620 dual sim is equipped with a Snapdragon 410 Qualcomm processor, Android 4.
